divs: Sighting DetailsME AND MY BEST FRIEND WENT TO THE SCHOOL AT NIGHT TO RUN THE FOOTBALL FIELD TOEXERCISE.MY FRIEND WAS LAYING ON THE TRUNK OF MY CAR RESTING AFTER A RUN.I WASINSIDE THE CAR TURNING ON THE RADIO . ALL OF A SUDDEN MY FRIEND SAID WHAT ARETHOSEUP OUT OF THE DRAINAGE CREEK CAME 3 LARGE HUMANOID ALMOST ROBOT LIKEFIGURES ABOUT 7FT TALL.ONE WAS CARRYING A CASE THAT LOOKED LIKE STEEL.
